description: A React component named NotesList that renders a list of notes, using context for state management and providing UI elements for displaying note details, favorites, tags, and actions on note selection.

methods.name: NotesList()
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of notes with interactive elements for selection, formatting dates, and handling empty states.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of a note by its ID, invoking an action to update state.

methods.name: fmtDate
methods.description: Formats ISO date strings into localized date-time strings for display.
